column2:
character
  1. alef-e madde
  2. â-ye bâ-kolâh (آی باکلاه = Alef with hat)

noun
  1. institution, rite, ceremony, custom, ordinance, canon, usage, prescription
  2. common law (in contradistinction to Islamic sharia law)
  3. mode, form, manner
  4. ornament, decoration

column1: آب در هاون کوبیدن|آب در هاوَن کوبیدن|âb dar hâvan kubidan
column2:
proverb
  1. to beat a dead horse: to persist to do something pointless, to make a futile attempt, or to do something in vain beyond any reason.

noun
  1. lit. water of life; Ab-i Hayat, elixir of life

noun
  1. washing and cleaning, sweeping clean (a building, a house, etc.)

noun
  1. climate, weather conditions
  2. Used other than figuratively or idiomatically: see آب, و, هوا.

adj
  1. inhabitable
  2. inhabited
  3. populous
  4. cultivated
  5. good, elegant, fair, beautiful, convenient

noun
  1. a city, building, habitation
  2. an open plain
  3. the Kaʻba or square temple at Mecca
  4. salutation, congratulation
  5. praise, eulogium, well done! bravo!
  6. name of the first prophet sent to Persia

suffix
  1. Forms names of towns and populated or inhabited areas.

name
  1. Aban, the eighth month of the solar Persian calendar.
  2. Name of the tenth day of any month of the solar Persian calendar.

noun

column2:
intj
  1. ouch, ow

noun
  1. Transliteration of the name of the Latin-script letter i in English and other European languages.

noun
  1. verse (of a holy book, such as the Qur'an or Bible)

noun
  1. institution, rite, ceremony, custom, ordinance, canon, usage, prescription
  2. common law (in contradistinction to the laws delivered by Muhammad)
  3. mode, form, manner
  4. (obsolete) ornament, decoration

character
  1. The first letter of the Persian alphabet.

character
  1. The first letter of the Perso-Arabic alphabet. Its name is اَلِف (alef).

prep
  1. (dialectal, Hamadan, Harat) from, since

suffix
  1. an adjective forming suffix
  2. a noun forming suffix
  3. (chiefly literary) a vocative suffix

noun
  1. abjad
  2. (figuratively) ABC, nuts and bolts (elementary facts, simple truths)

noun
  1. cloud
  2. a branch of Persian miniature
  3. sponge (a piece of porous material used for washing)

prep
  1. A prefix roughly equivalent to English super-, English over-

noun
  1. a decorated paper known as marbled paper in English

adj
  1. cloudy
  2. made using or related to the ebru technique

noun
  1. ibn; a word meaning "son", used only in patronymic names and certain literary expressions borrowed from Arabic.

name
  1. (Islam) Abu Bakr, first Islamic caliph. Successor and father-in-law of the prophet Muhammad. Father of Aisha. Confidant and companion or sahaba to Muhammad.

name
  1. Abu Dhabi (the capital city of the United Arab Emirates; capital city of Abu Dhabi Emirate, United Arab Emirates)
  2. Abu Dhabi (an emirate of the United Arab Emirates, the largest of the seven emirates)

noun
  1. Ebola

name
  1. Ebola (a river in the Democratic Republic of the Congo)

noun
  1. union (something formed by a combination or coalition of parts or members)

column2:
noun
  1. office (a building or room where clerical or professional duties are performed)
  2. administration (of public affairs) (the act of administering the services rendered or duties assumed)
  3. directorate (an agency headed by a director, usually a subdivision of a major government department)
  4. office (a major administrative division, notably in certain governmental administrations)

column2:
noun
  1. Transliteration of the name of the Latin-script letter s in English and other European languages.
  2. (slang) SMS

adj
  1. skilled, expert

noun
  1. master (an expert at something; a tradesman who is qualified to teach apprentices; a skilled artist)
  2. ustad
  3. (archaic) tutor
  4. a senior craftsman
  5. expert
  6. professor (a teacher or faculty member at a college or university regardless of formal rank)

adj
  1. scholarly
  2. masterfully
  3. expertly
  4. in a manner like that of a professor

noun
  1. start-up, startup (a new company or organisation or business venture designed for rapid growth)

noun
  1. act like a donkey; act stupidly or naively.

verb

column2:
noun
  1. A rhetorical question in which the speaker means to say the answer is negative. Example: کی گفتم این کار را بکن؟ [هیچوقت] key goftam in kâr râ bokon? [hič-vaqt], means "I never told you to do that." (lit. "When did I tell you to do that? [Never]")

column2:
noun
  1. luster; splendor; brilliance; illumination
  2. (literary) dawn; daybreak
  3. (philosophy) in the metaphysics of Suhrawardi, a cosmic light which permeates the essence of things

noun
  1. (literary, rare) A horse (or some other mammal) with only one testicle.
  2. A horse with one testicle larger than the other.

verb
  1. (dialectal, Kazerun) to split
  2. (dialectal, Kazerun) to rip

noun
  1. (archaic) level or storey of a structure
  2. (archaic) ceiling

noun

noun

  2. (Iran, potentially derogatory) Synonym of افغان (afğân, “Afghan; someone from Afghanistan”).
  3. (archaic) Synonym of پشتو (páštu, “Pashto language”).

adj
  1. Platonic, having to do with Plato and his views
  2. platonic, non-sexual

column2:
noun
  1. tribute, toll, duty, revenue, tax, impost
  2. any grievous imposition which distresses the poor or the conquered
  3. silence observed by the Pârsis while eating or performing their ablutions
  4. a fathom
  5. the shoulder
  6. the distance between each hand when the arms are horizontally extended in opposite directions
  7. the arm, or the upper part of it
  8. a finger joint
  9. name of a town in the dependencies of Tus, and birthplace of Ferdousi

verb
  1. (defective) Expresses an obligation or confident conjecture, equivalent to English must, have to, should, ought, etc.

verb
  1. (defective, auxiliary) to be necessary; must, ought

column2:
noun
  1. fortune, prosperity, felicity, happiness
  2. luck (good or bad)
  3. horoscope, nativity, planet, constellation
  4. nightmare
  5. kind of locust

verb
  1. (dialectal, Dashtestan) to sift
  2. (dialectal, Dashtestan) to sieve
  3. (obsolete) to save, rescue, redeem

noun
  1. An evil spirit in Iranian folklore equivalent to Germanic mare; nightmare.
  2. (figuratively) Any bad, miserable, difficult or terrifying situation or experience.

noun
  1. lot, part, portion
  2. section
  3. district
  4. fortune
  5. bakhsh, a type of administrative division of Iran

column2:
verb
  1. to take off (of a plane)
  2. to get up; to get out of bed
  3. Used other than figuratively or idiomatically: see بلند, شدن: to grow taller, etc.

column2:
verb
  1. to become overwhelmed, fed up, plagued, or sick of lingering irritation

intj
  1. goodbye
  2. (sarcastic) indicates the speaker is happy about leaving of the other side; good riddance.

name
  1. Bahram (the Zoroastrian divinity)

  3. Name of the twentieth day of any month of the solar Persian calendar

  2. Name of the second day of any month of the solar Persian calendar

noun
  1. avalanche
  2. white behen (Centaurea behen)
  3. red behen (Limonium vulgare)
  4. common awn-grass (Stipa capensis)

column2:
name
  1. Takhar (a province of Afghanistan)
  2. Tocharian (a people who inhabited the Tarim Basin and spoke Tocharian)

noun
  1. board (a relatively long and wide piece of any material, usually wood)
  2. plank
  3. board; blackboard, chalkboard, whiteboard

verb
  1. (obsolete) to try, to make an effort

noun
  1. seed, grain
  2. sperm, semen
  3. ovum, egg
  4. (informal, figuratively after “egg”) testicle
  5. (figuratively) origin

column1: تخم جن|تخم جنتَرین|toxm-e jen|تخم جنتَر|تخمِ جنها
column2:
adj
  1. (archaic) changeling, exchanged by fairies or evil spirits
  2. (offensive, humorous) used to refer to a mischievous child

noun
  1. (archaic) a changeling
  2. (offensive, humorous) a disobedient, rogue, or mischievous child

noun
  1. (anatomy) ovary (female reproductive organ)
  2. (botany) ovary (lower part of a pistil or carpel)

adj
  1. moist, wet

suffix
  1. A suffix forming the comparative degree of an adjective.

verb
  1. (dialectal, Kazerun) to shave
  2. (dialectal, Kazerun) to erase

column2:
noun
  1. citron (fruit)
  2. (art) medallion created using rich arabesque patterns usually found in the center of some artworks, especially that of a (Persian) carpet, an illuminated manuscript, or in Islamic tiles

noun
  1. (archaic) garden herb in general, especially beets, spinach, cresses, leek, parsley, pot-herb
  2. (Iran) Iranian leek, Persian leek (Allium ampeloprasum subsp. persicum, a specific cultivar of the great-headed garlic, Allium ampeloprasum)

noun
  1. approval; acceptance; ratification
  2. (law) ratification; passing a law

verb
  1. to conform, to be conform
  2. to agree
  3. to correspond
  4. to be similar or analogous

noun
  1. ta'arof/taarof; the intricate Persian system of etiquette and good manners, emphasizing extreme deference, humility, and respect.

verb

column2:
noun
  1. heifer
  2. an oblong piece of cloth which can be either prostrated for a horse blanket or stitched together for a double saddlebag

noun
  1. (archaic) darkness, blackness
  2. a disease in the eye, the web or cataract on the pupil
  3. any veil or covering
  4. theme

noun
  1. sight seeing
  2. walking outside for recreation
  3. beholding
  4. looking at anything comic or tragic
  5. an entertainment, show, theatrical representation
  6. sport, amusement, pleasure
  7. interest
  8. any interesting object

column2:
verb
  1. to set, adjust (a clock, device)
  2. to fix, arrange (an appointment)

adj
  1. narrow, strait; tight

noun
  1. flagon, carafe, decanter
  2. a bundle on one half of a beast of burden, package, ass-load
  3. a girth, a strap, a band, a brace
  4. a wooden instrument with iron teeth used in separating rice from the chaff
  5. a machine for making powder
  6. an oil-press

noun
  1. strait
  2. (archaic) a piece of gold or silver
  3. tenge (currency)

noun
  1. an Iranian dish, a rice cake composed of rice, yogurt, saffron and other spices, egg, and chicken or other meat or filling

pron
  1. you, thou (informal, singular)
  2. (generally with following را) you, thee
  3. (at the end of an ezafe) your, thy

noun
  1. pool, puddle
  2. fold, twist, turn
  3. inside; interior
  4. (In some dialects as Luri) room, especially an outdoor room (Synonymous with Tehrani Persian اتاق which is of Turkic origin)

prep
  1. in; inside

adv
  1. inside

adj
  1. within; interior; inner

noun
  1. madwort (Alyssum gen. et spp.)
  2. tumble mustard, hedge mustard (Sisymbrium officinale)

name
  1. Toronto (the capital city of Ontario, Canada, and largest city in Canada)

noun
  1. betulaceous tree, alder or birch (whereof the disyllables more often alder and the monosyllables birch)
  2. (variant تیس (tis)) mountain ash, rowan (Sorbus aucuparia)

noun
  1. provisions (food that you take on a trip)

column2:
verb
  1. to attack; to raid
  2. to run at; to rush at
  3. to exercise; to move
  4. to lose weight from heavy motion and movement
  5. to shake (a carpet)
  6. to run to and fro

noun
  1. leaning, reclining
  2. support, cushion
  3. (religion) takyeh, a building where Shia Muslims gather to mourn Husayn's death in the month of Muharram
  4. (linguistics) stress

noun
  1. any object which provides support for another; prop
  2. a person who provides support
  3. fulcrum

verb
  1. to call a mobile phone and let it ring once (usually to tell the other person to call back, or to let the other person to easily save the first person's number to his phone's memory, without having to enter it manually)

noun
  1. Texan

adj
  1. Texan, of, from, or pertaining to Texas

noun
  1. (dialectal, Alamarvdasht) blade, razor
  2. (dialectal, Alamarvdasht) sword
  3. (dialectal, Alamarvdasht) scimitar
  4. (dialectal, Alamarvdasht) knife

noun
  1. arrow
  2. bullet
  3. dart
  4. (mechanics, engineering) beam
  5. pole

name
  1. Tir, the fourth month of the solar Persian calendar.
  2. Name of the thirteenth day of any month of the solar Persian calendar.
  3. (astronomy) Mercury (planet)

noun
  1. (biology) Family (taxonomic rank); below an order and above a genus.

adj
  1. dark

noun
  1. grey partridge (a game bird in the pheasant family, Perdix perdix)

character
  1. The fifth letter of the Perso-Arabic alphabet. It is preceded by ت and followed by ج. Its name is ثه or ثِ.

adj

  2. (spoken, derogatory) absent-minded or clumsy (from the myth that masturbation negatively affects memory, intelligence, and dexterity)

  2. (figuratively) a merciless person, a violent person

adj

noun

  2. volume (of a book)

noun
  1. funeral
  2. bier, with a corpse on it
  3. corpse (dead body)

noun
  1. a person who is guilty of a major crime, notably breaking the law

verb
  1. to shake, quiver, vibrate
  2. to move around, fidget; wiggle around
  3. to move it, get a move on

noun
  1. clothes
  2. place to keep clothes or also other domestic implements

noun
  1. the bar of a door
  2. two pieces of wood used for smoothing linens; a calender, mangle
  3. (figuratively) detersion, smoothening, extenuation

adj
  1. wrinkled, unsmoothened
  2. clownish, boorish, unpolished

noun
  1. (vulgar) a prostitute
  2. (vulgar) a promiscuous woman
  3. (colloquial) overused

  2. prevailing throughout the entire world

noun

name
  1. (in particular) Jahangir, Mughal emperor (lived 1569—1627, r. 1605—1627)

name
  1. Jahangirnagar (former name of Dhaka, capital city of Bangladesh)

noun
  1. (archaic) Jew
  2. (now offensive, ethnic slur) yid, kike

noun
  1. (dialectal, Isfahan) stream
  2. (dialectal, Isfahan) brook

noun
  1. (now Dari and elsewhere dialectal) spider
  2. (obsolete) weaver

noun
  1. (rare, obsolete or literary) jewel
  2. (rare, obsolete or literary) gem
  3. (rare, obsolete or literary) pearl
  4. (philosophy) essence, substance
  5. ink
  6. dye
  7. acid

column2:
noun
  1. long, slender, beautiful neck
  2. the lower or front part of the neck, on which jewels are suspended

noun
  1. an ornament or jewel worn in the turban
  2. a crest with which a wrestler or champion is adorned

character
  1. The eighth letter of the Perso-Arabic alphabet. It is preceded by چ and followed by خ. Its name is حِ (he).

noun
  1. (Islam, title) a title given to people who have performed the pilgrimage to Mecca (hajj).

noun
  1. (Islam) a hajji, one who has participated in a hajj.
  2. (figuratively) used to address an elderly, usually pious-looking men. Also used as a title.
  3. (colloquial, in the vocative) dude or mate. Chiefly used to address a young, male, friend.

noun
  1. Hajji Firuz, a traditional character of Nowruz who heralds the New Year with song, dance and music-making; he wears a red costume and his face is coloured black by fire smoke.

column2:
adj
  1. present; current; as of now
  2. demonstrated; explained

adv
  1. (literary or Dari) now; in this moment

noun
  1. (archaic) an individual's chamber in a house
  2. a merchant's compartment in a bazaar
  3. a student's room in a seminary
  4. a compartment in a caravanserai
  5. a chamber in a hammam

adj
  1. (Islam) haram
  2. forbidden
  3. illegitimate
  4. analogous to saying "poor thing" as an expression of compassion towards the suffering

column2:
name
  1. The Muslim Sahabi Hamza ibn Abdul-Muttalib.
  2. a male surname

noun
  1. transport, carriage, bearing

name
  1. (Dari and dated elsewhere) Hamal, the first month of the solar Persian calendar.
  2. (astrology) Aries
  3. (astronomy) Hamal (An orange giant and the brightest star in the constellation Aries)

noun
  1. sphere
  2. domain
  3. realm
  4. extent
  5. circuit
  6. range of action
  7. field
  8. district
  9. hawza or seminary where Shi'a Muslim clerics are trained

column2:
name
  1. Hyderabad (the capital and largest city of Telangana, India, and de-jure capital of Andhra Pradesh)
  2. Hyderabad (a city in Sindh, Pakistan)
  3. Hyderabad State, a former state, landlocked in south-central India, from 1724 to 1948

character
  1. The ninth letter of the Perso-Arabic alphabet. It is preceded by ح and followed by د.

noun
  1. a drawing
  2. ornamented decoration, patterned or inlaid motifs
  3. (archaic) a seal, a signet
  4. (archaic) a ring
  5. (archaic) a command, an edict

noun
  1. Christian cross
  2. the soft part of the ear

column2:
name
  1. Khorasan, Greater Khorasan
  2. Khorasan (a region in Iran now divided in three provinces)

adj
  1. Khorasani (of or pertaining to Khorasan or Greater Khorasan)
  2. (poetry) Khorasani style or tradition
  3. (architecture) Khorasani style or tradition

adj
  1. (dialectal, Tang-e Eram) ruined
  2. (dialectal, Tang-e Eram) devastated
  3. (dialectal, Tang-e Eram) demolished
  4. (dialectal, Tang-e Eram) destroyed
  5. (dialectal, Tang-e Eram) drunk, intoxicated
  6. (dialectal, Tang-e Eram) spoiled
  7. (dialectal, Tang-e Eram) miserable

noun
  1. (dialectal, Tang-e Eram) ruin
  2. (dialectal, Tang-e Eram) desolation

noun
  1. mantle; cloak; habit (usually of a dervish or saint, especially one ragged from asceticism)

name
  1. Khorramabad (a city, the provincial capital of Lorestan, Iran)

noun
  1. (literary, literally) A small donkey.
  2. (carpentry) trestle
  3. pommel horse, vault
  4. (music, lutherie) bridge (of a musical instrument)
  5. jack, jack stand, axle stand

noun
  1. tent, pavilion, tabernacle
  2. wide, spacious place of residence

noun
  1. hare, rabbit
  2. greater plantain (Plantago major)
  3. mullein (Verbascum gen et spp.)

noun

  2. (obsolete, nautical) rudder

noun

noun

  2. being contrary; opposition, contradiction, disagreement

noun

  2. (archaic) people, folk
  3. temperament, disposition, character, personality
  4. humour, mood
  5. behaviour
  6. rags

adj

verb
  1. (archaic) to hurt by introducing a sharp point, to sting

column2:
verb
  1. to want, to intend (both of nouns and verbs)
  2. (with از) to ask; to request
  3. (literary, auxiliary) will; in the literary language, appears in the aorist to form the future tense, preceding the bare past stem of the main verb
  4. to be owed

noun

  2. (dated) tablecloth

noun

adj
  1. cold-blooded (having an unregulated body temperature)
  2. cool, coolheaded (having an even temper during times of difficulty)

noun
  1. (Zoroastrianism) Xwanirah, the central and largest of the continents in Zoroastrianism and Old Iranian Mythology, believed to be the region where the most advanced civilizations on earth reside.
  2. (obsolete) The homeland of the Aryan (Iranian) people.

column2:
verb
  1. to surround, to engulf
  2. to consist, to contain

noun
  1. level, extent, rate
  2. (geometry) degree (a unit of measurement of angle equal to 1/360 of a circle's circumference)
  3. (mathematics) degree (the sum of the exponents of a term; the order of a polynomial)
  4. (military) rank
  5. (physics, of temperature) degree (a unit of measurement of temperature on any of several scales, such as Celsius)

verb
  1. to shine
  2. to luster, to sheen, to lighten
  3. to coruscate, to glister, to glisten, to glitter, to glint
  4. to glorify, to exalt, to praise, to honor

column2:
verb
  1. to lie, to tell lies
  2. to speak falsely

noun
  1. interior, inside, inner, inward, bowels, core, heart
  2. a kind of corn measure
  3. a certain ritual by the Zoroastrians

prep
  1. in, inside
  2. amongst, within, between
  3. into, directionally inside

adv
  1. inside, from the inner

adj
  1. poor, needy

noun
  1. indigent, poor, especially a worthy one
  2. a poor, indigent, ascetic, and abstemious person or recluse; Dervish, Sufi

verb
  1. to understand intellectually; to get; to comprehend
  2. to realise
  3. to perceive

name
  1. Dari, Dari Persian

adj
  1. (obsolete) of or related to court
  2. (obsolete) language of the court
  3. (literary) of or related to valley

column2:
noun
  1. command, order
  2. method, manner, procedure, way
  3. guideline, rule
  4. permission, leave, authority
  5. basis, foundation
  6. model, example, exemplar
  7. (law, government) constitution
  8. (archaic) statesman, vizier
  9. (linguistics) grammar (دستور زبان (dastur-e zabân))
  10. (Zoroastrianism) dastur

verb
  1. to arrest (to seize someone with the authority of the law)

adj
  1. portable, handheld (device and equipment that are small and light enough to be carried by hand)
  2. made by hand, handcrafted
  3. tamed, domesticated (especially of birds)
  4. fake, artificial
  5. (rare, only in certain compounds) temporary, short-term

noun
  1. Certain vessels, dishes, or containers that have handles on both sides such as baskets, pots, etc. (usage varies by region)

column2:
verb
  1. to store, stock, stock up
  2. to save (for example, a file on the computer)

character
  1. The twelfth letter of the Perso-Arabic alphabet. It is preceded by ذ and followed by ز. Its name is ره or رِ.

noun
  1. (music) D, Re (the second note of the fixed-Do solfège scale)
  2. (music) Re (the second note of the movable-Do solfège scale, i.e. the supertonic)

column2:
particle
  1. Used after certain noun phrases which are the direct object, normally a definite direct object; hence often called the “definite object marker”. See Usage notes.
  2. (often dated) to; indicates that the preceding noun phrase is an indirect object.
  3. (colloquial) Can be optionally used to mark the topic if it has been moved to the beginning of the sentence for topicalization, with certain exceptions.
  4. (colloquial) Sometimes appears after nouns being used adverbially, such as فردا (fardâ, “tomorrow”).
  5. (archaic) for the sake of
  6. (archaic) Used with the verb بودن (budan, “to be”) to mark the possessor of something.

name
  1. a person from Rey
  2. a nisba most notably held by Rhazes (al-Razi)

adj
  1. straight
  2. direct; straight
  3. right (dexter, opposite of left)
  4. true; right
  5. erect

noun
  1. truth
  2. (music) rast (a Persian mode)

verb
  1. to rub, grind
  2. to pulverise
  3. to wear away, erode

noun
  1. vegetable, herb (fleshy or leafy edible plant with a savoury taste)
  2. greenness, verdure

noun
  1. the "Khorasani style" of Persian poetry: the earliest style of New Persian verse, associated with poets from Khorasan and Transoxiana of the ninth to the twelfth centuries (such as Rudaki or Ferdowsi) and characterized by a rarity of Arabic loanwords

noun
  1. the "Iraqi style" of Persian poetry: the second style of New Persian verse from the twelfth to the fifteenth centuries, characterized by greater use of specialized vocabulary and mystical themes and exemplified by poets from western Iran such as Sa'adi and Hafez

noun
  1. the "Indian style" of Persian poetry: the third style of New Persian verse from the fifteenth to the nineteenth centuries, characterized by extravagant use of language and often associated with poets working under the patronage of the Mughals and other South Asian rulers; in modern Iran, it is often criticized for purple prose

noun
  1. star
  2. fate, destiny
  3. star (actors, athletes, etc.)
  4. asterisk, the symbol "*"
  5. (archaic) spark

noun
  1. starfish (any of various asteroids or other echinoderms)

verb
  1. to praise, to commend
  2. to extol, to eulogize
  3. to glorify
  4. to adore
  5. to worship

name
  1. (archaic) The city of Zabol
  2. (archaic) Sejestan, a region of the eastern Iranian Plateau now known as Sistan.

adj
  1. hard, difficult (of a task)
  2. hard, solid (of a material)
  3. severe, strict
  4. severe, intense

verb
  1. (literary or dialectal) Alternative form of سوختن (suxtan, “to burn”)
  2. (literary or archaic) Alternative form of سنجیدن (sanjidan, “to compare, weigh”)

noun
  1. (anatomy) head

  3. (Sistani) a kind of clay
  4. secret
  5. Sir (the titular prefix given to a knight or baronet)

column2:
verb
  1. (transitive, used with به) to visit (to go and meet, as an act of friendliness or sociability)
  2. (intransitive) to grow (of plants)
  3. (intransitive) to rise (of the sun or other celestial bodies)
  4. (transitive, used with را) to decapitate, to kill

noun

name

noun

noun
  1. lime, glue
  2. gluten, the sticky part from bran
  3. isinglass
  4. kingspear (Asphodelus gen. et spp.)
  5. desert candle (Eremurus gen. et spp.)

  4. to fit, to suit

  2. (dated, literary) soft (giving way under pressure)
  3. (dated, literary) lazy, idle
  4. (obsolete) slow
  5. (literary) relaxed, negligent, phlegmatic

column2:
verb
  1. To order (to request some product or service)

adj
  1. hard (resistant to pressure, not soft)
  2. tough, hard (of food, difficult to cut or chew)
  3. thick (of a liquid, having a viscous consistency)
  4. taut (of a rope, length of material, bow string; tight, under tension)

column2:
adj
  1. who undertakes a journey, ready to travel

noun
  1. A traditional-style Iranian restaurant, where guests are seated on individual raised platform areas covered with Persian carpets with large cushions around the edges; they are served tea and traditional dishes, and may smoke from a ghalyan (hookah).
  2. A traditional dining-room.

column2:
noun
  1. tuberculosis
  2. (music) G, Sol (the fifth note of the fixed-Do solfège scale)
  3. (music) Sol (the fifth note of the movable-Do solfège scale, i.e. the dominant)

intj
  1. hello, hi, hiya

noun
  1. salutation; greeting
  2. (military) salute
  3. (Islam) Salam at the end of prayer.

intj
  1. good day to you, good afternoon, hello, salaam alaikum (a somewhat formal Islamic greeting)

  1. Yalda Night, the Iranian celebration of winter solstice.

  2. day and night, always

column2:
noun
  1. method, technique, way
  2. gamesmanship
  3. device, artifice ( A project or scheme, often designed to deceive.)
  4. (dialectal, Khorasan) turn (Using (something) shared in sequence with others.)

noun
  1. slope, declivity, tilt, descend
  2. fundament, bottom of human anatomy
  3. base of a shield
  4. wet ground made unequal and rugged by man tramping

adj
  1. not the full shilling, doolally, barmy
  2. hasty, precipitate

noun
  1. lion
  2. faucet, tap
  3. (India) tiger (sometimes also applied to the leopard)
  4. milk

name
  1. (astronomy) Leo

name
  1. Shiraz (a city in Iran)

noun
  1. (obsolete) yoghurt drained of whey

adj
  1. (archaic, literary) lionlike, leonine
  2. (figuratively, literary) courageous, valiant, or violent

name
  1. Shirgah, an Iranian city in Savadkuh county, Mazandaran province, Iran.

adj
  1. sweet
  2. pleasant

name
  1. Shirin (queen of Armenia and wife of Khosrow II, a character in the Shahnameh and in Khosrow and Shirin)

name
  1. the Shinwari, a Pashtun tribe
  2. Shinwari (a district of Afghanistan)

character
  1. The seventeenth letter of the Perso-Arabic alphabet. It is preceded by ش and followed by ض. Its name is صاد.

column2:
noun
  1. (rare) Alternative form of چنار (čenâr, “oriental plane (Platanus orientalis)”)

noun
  1. sandalwood
  2. sandal, a kind of slipper
  3. a small boat employed in carrying fresh water and victuals to ships lying at a distance from shore, a bumboat

noun
  1. box, trunk, case, chest, casket
  2. till, cash register

column1: صندوق بین‌المللی پول|صندوق بینالمللی پول|Sanduq-e Beyn-olmelali-ye Pul|Sandoq

column2:
noun
  1. (Dari) class (group, collection, category or set sharing characteristics or attributes)
  2. guild (a group of tradespeople made up of merchants, craftspeople, or artisans)

name
  1. Champa (a historical region in Farther India)

column2:
noun
  1. face
  2. form; shape
  3. (often with به) way; manner (of doing something)
  4. (with در) case; eventuality
  5. (arithmetic) numerator

noun
  1. (Twelver Shiite Islam) mut'a; sigheh; temporary marriage (a religiously legitimate form of relationship between a man and a woman that, in comparison to actual marriage, involves lesser financial duties for the former and lesser duties of obedience for the latter)

character
  1. The eighteenth letter of the Perso-Arabic alphabet. It is preceded by ص and followed by ط. Its name is ضاد.

adj
  1. thick (of size or a layer, relatively large)

noun
  1. side (bounding straight edge of a two-dimensional shape)

noun
  1. Contents; enclosures.
  2. Middle; inside. See جوف & تو (too).
  3. Interim, meantime.

adv
  1. Meanwhile, in the meantime: also, at the same time.
  2. Enclosed. in the inside.
  3. Among (or along with) other things; besides.
  4. By the way.
  5. In the middle of; in.
  6. Along with; together with. در این ضمن In the meantime, meanwhile.

character
  1. The nineteenth letter of the Perso-Arabic alphabet. It is preceded by ض and followed by ظ. Its name is طا.

noun
  1. wooden building of a circular form with an arched roof, gazebo
  2. dome; roof
  3. palisade to exclude people from a garden
  4. trellis for vine and other climbing plants

noun

adj

noun
  1. conformity, correspondence
  2. plate, large dish, tray

column2:
noun
  1. lock of hair; ringlet; tress
  2. strand; tuft; crest
  3. (architecture) cantilever

name
  1. (obsolete) Alternative form of تهران (tehrân): Tehran (the capital city of Iran)
  2. (obsolete) Alternative form of تهران (tehrân): Tehran (a province of Iran)

name
  1. (Iranian mythology) A character in Shahnameh
  2. (historical) Name of two kings of Safavid Persia.

name
  1. (Iranian mythology) Tahmooras, Tahmoorath, a mythical king mentioned in the Shahnameh.

noun
  1. manner, way
  2. state, condition

name
  1. Short for طور سینا (tur-e sinâi, “Mount Sinai”).

  1. to take a long time
  2. (of a quantified time) to take, to last

noun
  1. (Dari and dated in Iran) airplane, aeroplane

character
  1. The twentieth letter of the Perso-Arabic alphabet. It is preceded by ط and followed by ع. Its name is ظا.

noun
  1. dish, vessel, container
  2. (figuratively) ability, capacity
  3. (figuratively) patience, forbearance
  4. (grammar) adverb

name
  1. Zafarobod (a district of Sughd, Tajikistan).
  2. Zafarobod (the district capital of Zafarobod district, Sughd, Tajikistan)

character
  1. The twenty-first letter of the Perso-Arabic alphabet. It is preceded by ظ and followed by غ. Its name is عین.

name
  1. (Islam) Ashura, a holy day falling on the 10th day of Muharram, commemorating the martyrdom of Husayn ibn Ali at Karbala in 680 AD.

adj
  1. (law) pro bono, for the public good.

noun
  1. A long gown or cloak open at the front, worn by clergy in Iran.

  2. Osman, any of a number of Ottoman sultans

noun
  1. wonder, marvel, astonishment, amazement
  2. pride, vanity, conceit

intj
  1. what a wonder, how strange, amazing

noun
  1. old woman; crone; hag; beldam
  2. witch; sorceress
  3. (figuratively, poetic) the frail and transient world, compared to a decrepit woman

noun
  1. the Arabian Peninsula; Arabia
  2. Saudi Arabia
  3. (historical) Arabistan (a historical region of southwestern Iran)

noun
  1. breadth, width
  2. latitude
  3. (philosophy) accident, form (as opposed to substance)
  4. symptom, manifestation
  5. request, petition
  6. reputation

noun

  2. gnosis, the attainment of direct spiritual knowledge
  3. mysticism
  4. Islamic mysticism

noun

  2. arak, araq (aniseed-flavoured distilled alcoholic drink)
  3. spirit, any type of distilled alcoholic beverage

  2. a vagabond, a tramp

  2. (archaic) living; life

noun

noun

column2:
noun
  1. cereal, corn, grain (type of plant and its fruit)

noun
  1. exaggeration; hyperbole
  2. (Shia Islam) heretical elevation of the status of the Imams, e.g. claiming that they were divine

adj
  1. thick (having a viscous consistency)
  2. thick (impenetrable to sight, for example fog, dust in the air)
  3. (of an accent) thick (difficult to understand or poorly articulated)

noun
  1. (obsolete) profound reflection or contemplation

name
  1. Ghor (a province of Afghanistan)

adj
  1. unripe, green (of grapes, dates, olives)

noun
  1. sour grape, unripe grape

noun
  1. (especially Islam) the unseen; the mysterious and invisible, known only to God and the prophets and imams

noun
  1. the tendency to control the female members of the family—and sometimes the clan, tribe, or motherland—and to protect them from sexual attention
  2. the desire to rise against oppression, or to defend the powerless
  3. being conjured to action for the sake of wounded pride or indignity
  4. zeal, enthusiasm, ardor, fervency

suffix
  1. a suffix that makes agent nouns; such as -er

suffix
  1. of or pertaining to
  2. one from or belonging to
  3. Forms the word for a profession, and the place it is practiced, from the word for the person who practice it
  4. able to, capabale of being, deserved to be, determined to, and/or destined to
  5. Forms surnames.
  6. Forms abstract nouns from adjectives.
  7. a, one; Marks a noun phrase as indefinite or non-specific, especially in the literary language.
  8. Marks a noun phrase attributed by a subordinate clause as restrictive.

suffix
  1. Used to form nouns of action or process.

character
  1. The twenty-third letter of the Perso-Arabic alphabet. It is preceded by غ and followed by ق. Its name is فه or فِ.

noun
  1. (music) F, Fa (the fourth note of the fixed-Do solfège scale)
  2. (music) Fa (the fourth note of the movable-Do solfège scale, i.e. the subdominant)

noun
  1. Sichuan pepper (any of the spice plants under the Zanthoxylum genus and their produce)

adj
  1. Persian, Persic

noun
  1. Persian (the language of Ancient Persia).
  2. Persian (the language of modern Iran, Afghanistan and Tajikistan, and widely spoken in Uzbekistan).
  3. Persian, main ethnic group of Iran.

adj
  1. unencumbered, unburdened, free, unconcerned with
  2. (of a woman) having delivered

noun
  1. graduate (person who is recognized by a university as having completed the requirements of a degree studied at the institution)

column2:
noun
  1. difference
  2. inequality
  3. summit of the skull, parting of the hair

verb
  1. to order, to command
  2. (deferential, formal) to say; used as a substitute for گفتن (goftan, “to say”) to show respect
  3. (deferential, formal) In compound verbs, occasionally used as a substitute for کردن (kardan, “to do”) to show respect

noun
  1. (archaic) Frank, French
  2. (archaic) crusader
  3. (archaic) European
  4. (archaic) Christian

name
  1. (archaic) Francia
  2. (dated) France
  3. (dated) Western world, especially Europe

column2:
verb
  1. to understand (hear correctly and know the language)
  2. to understand intellectually; to get; to comprehend
  3. (Dari, colloquial) to know

noun

name
  1. Caesar, a Roman gens whose most notable member was Julius Caesar

noun
  1. Roman or Byzantine emperor
  2. Kaiser; Holy Roman or German emperor

name
  1. Kashan is a city in the northern part of Isfahan province, Iran

character
  1. The twenty-seventh letter of the Perso-Arabic alphabet. It is preceded by گ and followed by م. Its name is لام.

noun
  1. (music) A, La (the sixth note of the fixed-Do solfège scale)
  2. (music) La (the sixth note of the movable-Do solfège scale, i.e. the submediant)
  3. fold
  4. layer
  5. ply
  6. strand

particle

  3. red

noun

noun

  2. (archaic) tutor; especially, tutor of royal princes or other noble children

intj
  1. Used to hush a baby to sleep.

noun

  2. microscope slide

name

noun

  2. valley between mountains
  3. complain king, lamenter

noun

intj

column2:
noun
  1. coat
  2. (Iran) A long, loose-fitting coat worn by Iranian Muslim women based off the trenchcoat, originally worn with a square Arabic-style hijab and in plain colours such as beige, black, pale blue or cream, originating in the 1970s as a political statement by young, educated women, especially students, many devoted to leftist or modern Islamist ideals, though in the decades following the Iranian Revolution has come to be worn as a tighter-fitting garment with a looser scarf by younger Iranian women as a way of compromising with the country’s mandatory hijab laws while remaining fashionable.

column2:
noun
  1. a particular tree
  2. the lower one of the two pieces of wood from which fire is struck by rubbing, the upper being called عفار (ʻafār), and both taking their names from the tree from which they are respectively cut

noun
  1. man (adult male human)
  2. (calque from English, in the vocative) used to address a man
  3. a member of a team or group, usually in plural

name
  1. Mordad, the fifth month of the solar Persian calendar.
  2. Name of the seventh day of any month of the solar Persian calendar.

name
  1. Malayer a city and capital of Malayer County, Hamadan Province, Iran.

adj
  1. uninterested, jaded.
  2. sad and dispirited.
  3. (Regional dialects) lukewarm, tepid, moderately warm.

noun
  1. queen regnant (a female monarch who reigns in her own right)

column2:
adj
  1. Gregorian, relating to the Gregorian calendar
  2. AD, CE

suffix
  1. -th; creates ordinal numbers.

noun
  1. (Iran) mine (exploding device)
  2. (Dari) Alternative form of ماین (“mine (exploding device)”).
  3. (dialectal) hair

intj
  1. so (used after a pause for thought to introduce a new topic, question or story)

character
  1. The twenty-ninth letter of the Perso-Arabic alphabet. It is preceded by م and followed by و. Its name is نون.

prefix
  1. (dialectal) A prefix used before personal endings or definite direct object marker (e) to link a pronoun that ends in certain vowels.
  2. (dialectal) A prefix used before personal endings or definite direct object marker (e) to link a word that ends in certain vowels.

column2:
verb
  1. to annihilate, eradicate, completely destroy (to reduce to nothing, put an end to; for example, a city, civilization)
  2. to destroy, kill (bacteria, germs)

noun
  1. (nautical) skipper, shipmaster, master mariner
  2. (military) captain (naval officer)
  3. (rare) atheist

noun
  1. (Transoxianan, obsolete) a large tree with many branches
  2. elm
  3. (obsolete) pomegranate tree

column2:
noun
  1. bread, including the kind called naan in English and any other kind of bread
  2. (Dari) any food

noun
  1. (archaic) boat, small ship
  2. warship; cruiser
  3. anything long and hollow
  4. pipe
  5. gutter, drainpipe, water pipe, downpipe
  6. a river, stream; channel, canal, aqueduct; river basin
  7. a cistern; tankage
  8. trough; feeder
  9. the sluice of a mill-dam
  10. the furrow or groove down the middle of a man's back or the loins of a horse; also in a grain of wheat and a date-stone
  11. gluteal cleft
  12. the passage through which the meal or flour runs when grinding
  13. a hole
  14. a crack, chink
  15. a baker's rolling-pin
  16. a frying pan
  17. a cauldron, kettle, pot
  18. an easy, graceful air in walking

name
  1. Nain, a city and capital of Nain County, Isfahan Province, Iran.

column2:
name
  1. Najd, the central region of Saudi Arabia

noun
  1. (obsolete) he-goat, with spreading horns and long legs, that leads the flock.

suffix
  1. -ing; suffix of the noun of agent.

adj
  1. male, masculine, manlike

noun
  1. male, masculine
  2. husband
  3. stallion
  4. bull
  5. buck; male deer, goat, sheep, rabbit, hare
  6. the male of any species
  7. (anatomy) membrum virile, the penis
  8. the middle branch from which others spring
  9. a wave
  10. a hermaphrodite

column2:
noun
  1. the top middle area of a pair of trousers or drawers where a cord goes through to support the two legs, waistband or a certain part thereof
  2. the cord itself, thong, strap
  3. hide of a dead animal, particularly belly-skin
  4. a square wrapper in which wearing-apparel is folded up
  5. fox

verb
  1. (archaic or literary) to listen
  2. (obsolete) to overhear

name
  1. New York
  2. New York City (a city in the United States)

character
  1. The thirty-first letter of the Perso-Arabic alphabet. It is preceded by و and followed by ی. Its name is هه or هِ.

suffix
  1. ezāfe suffix or linking particle (marks the possessed case or links dependent adjectives to the noun)
  2. (colloquial) Suffix functioning as the impersonal pronoun one (“one thing (among a group of others)”)
  3. Suffix forming adjectives from verbal stems
  4. Suffix forming nouns, from adjectives and present stems

suffix
  1. A suffix forming the plural of a noun. Used for most nouns in colloquial language and inanimate nouns in formal language.

name
  1. (Iranian mythology) Hamavaran (a legendary version of Yemen)

noun
  1. plain, level ground
  2. earth (as opposed to sky and sea)
  3. desert

name
  1. Hamoon Lake, Iran

noun
  1. (archaic, regional, Baluchistan) late summer; harvest season of dates

noun
  1. mortar (tool used with pestle).
  2. (by extension) pestle and mortar.

noun
  1. (poetic) a separation or remoteness from one's friend, beloved, or homeland

name
  1. Herat (a city in Afghanistan)
  2. Herat (a province of Afghanistan)

column2:
name
  1. Ahura Mazda
  2. (astronomy) Jupiter
  3. Name of the first day of a solar month
  4. An island in the strait of the same name, five miles off the Iranian coast.
  5. The strait that connects the Persian Gulf with the Gulf of Oman.
  6. A district of Qeshm, Hormozgan, Iran.
  7. A city in Iran; capital of the district of the same name.
  8. (historical) Ormus, a kingdom in the Persian Gulf

adv
  1. (with subjunctive) whatever
  2. (with indicative) everything
  3. Used to form constructions equivalent to English the more... the more.
  4. (followed by a comparative adjective) as possible

adv
  1. (in positive constructions) ever
  2. (in negative constructions) ever; never
  3. perpetually (with negative meaning)

  1. to let, allow
  2. to put, place, deposit
  3. to leave
  4. (archaic) to dismiss, abandon; to let go

noun
  1. (Internet) hashtag (metadata tag, signalled by a preceding hash sign (#), used to label content)

noun
  1. octopus (any of several marine molluscs of the family Octopodidae)

noun
  1. Haft Sin, or seven 's's; the seven items beginning with the letter sin س which are displayed on a sofreh or table-cloth in the days running up to Nowruz (the Persian New Year). The items have a special symbolic value.

  1. (Transoxianan, obsolete) dried balls made from sour milk.

noun
  1. playmate
  2. teammate (in a game); fellow actor (in a performance)

name
  1. Hamadan, a province in western Iran, capital Hamadan City

noun
  1. companion, fellow traveller
  2. escort, guard

adj
  1. accompanying
  2. of the same mind, sympathizing
  3. (technology) mobile

prep
  1. along with, together with

noun
  1. the hamza (an Arabic letter representing the glottal stop)

noun
  1. (dialectal, Isfahan, Shiraz, Kazerun, Bushehr) alternative form of همسایه (hamsâye, “neighbour”)

noun
  1. Looking for a husband or wife, a partner.

noun
  1. person from the same town in Iran

adj

  2. (dialectal, Khesht, Konartakhteh, Dashtestan) same

adv
  1. likewise, in such a manner, thus
  2. (formal) still, as yet

adv

verb
  1. to protect, guard, watch
  2. to stand firm, wait, to be constant, steady, fixed, established
  3. to subsist independently of anything

  5. to trample upon, wear, beat, or make smooth with the feet
  6. to kick
  7. to wait, expect

column2:
noun
  1. (Iranian mythology) sprite or supernatural being in Iranian/Persian mythology opposed to دیوسان (daemon) and دیو (daeva); peri.
  2. (Roman mythology) fury
  3. (mythology) fairy
  4. (mythology) witch (parika in Avestan mythology)
  5. (figuratively) a beautiful woman
  6. fullness
  7. (archaic) the day before yesterday

adv
  1. (archaic) the day before yesterday

column2:
name
  1. Beijing (a direct-administered municipality, the capital city of China)

noun
  1. The letters "P" and the Greek "Π"
  2. (mathematics) Pi, An irrational and transcendental constant representing the ratio of the circumference of a Euclidean circle to its diameter; approximately 3.1415926535897932384626433832795; usually written π.
  3. (architecture) A foundation; the lowest and supporting part or member of a wall, including the base course and footing courses; in a frame house, the whole substructure of masonry.
  4. behind, back

column2:
character
  1. The seventh letter of the Perso-Arabic alphabet. It is preceded by ج and followed by ح. Its name is چه or چِ.

noun
  1. tent
  2. chador (a large single piece of cloth worn as a covering over the clothing)
  3. awning

noun
  1. bedsheet
  2. large veil that covers the entire body
  3. (Islam) jilbab

noun
  1. a kind of vault resting on four pillars

noun
  1. (archaic) sampling of taste, gustation
  2. condiment, seasoning, relish

noun
  1. pit
  2. hole
  3. (dialectal, Kazerun) lair
  4. (dialectal, Kazerun) nest
  5. (dialectal, Kazerun) den

noun
  1. well (a hole sunk into the ground as a source of water, oil, natural gas or other fluids)

noun
  1. (historical) A paper money used in medieval China and briefly introduced by the Mongols to Iran in 1294; the first paper currency in the Islamic world, it proved an economic failure.

noun
  1. (historical) the head of a caravan who loudly sang poems in medieval Persia
  2. (obsolete) beadle, apparitor, usher, pursuivant, messenger, herald
  3. (dialectal, Khorasan) singing

noun
  1. a vessel in which dried tea is kept, tea caddy

verb
  1. (archaic) to struggle
  2. (archaic) to try, to attempt

adv
  1. why

intj
  1. (definite positive response to a negative question or statement) yes; surely

noun
  1. torch (Australia, Ireland, New Zealand, South Africa, UK), flashlight (Canada, US)

noun
  1. rotation
  2. spin, twirl (circular motion)
  3. (skating) spin (movement on ice involving spinning on the spot)

verb
  1. (intransitive) to rotate, turn, revolve, spin (to move around an axis)
  2. (intransitive) to spin (to rotate or turn around quickly)
  3. (intransitive) to circle (to travel in a circle or circles)
  4. (intransitive) to walk around, have a walk around

  1. (music, especially Iranian traditional music) koron, a symbol used to lower a note by an interval smaller than a semitone and broadly corresponding to a quarter tone. It is used to show an effect on pitch in a similar way to a sharp or a flat.

column2:
noun
  1. coma, a prolonged state of unconsciousness
  2. (modernly employed for) various Ferula and what is now Dorema species
  3. the gum of such a plant, galbanum
  4. (obsolete) mace, the envelope of nutmeg
  5. oven glove
  6. sleeve

noun
  1. an opopanax-like gum from a certain umbelliferous plant

noun
  1. waist
  2. girdle, belt
  3. the middle of a mountain
  4. the flank of an army
  5. arch, cupola, dome, arched bridge

noun
  1. vault
  2. the string worn by the followers of Zoroaster

  2. a pottery, a potter's shop or workshop

noun
  1. Kus, a large ancient Persian drum akin to a timpani.
  2. (vulgar, slang) Alternative form of کس (kos)

name
  1. Kos or Cos (Greek island of the Dodecanese)

noun
  1. shark
  2. man with little or no beard
  3. a carnival character known to the medieval and modern folklore of central and western Persia

column2:
suffix
  1. A suffix used to form adjectives and nouns with the meaning of "pertaining to" or "relating to" but many have developed to more specific meanings
  2. A suffix forming the plural of animate nouns, with some exceptions. The main form is ان (ân), but it becomes گان (-gân) after a silent ه (h), یان after و or ا.

column2:
verb
  1. to spend; to pass (especially of time)
  2. to lead; to transmit; to cause to pass
  3. to settle (a dispute, etc.); to get over (a difficulty, etc.)

column2:
verb
  1. (intransitive) to rotate, turn, revolve, spin (to move around an axis)
  2. (intransitive) to spin (to rotate or turn around quickly)
  3. (intransitive) to circulate (to move in a circuit, for example blood, air)
  4. (intransitive) to circle (to travel in a circle or circles)
  5. (intransitive) to walk around, have a walk around
  6. to become, to be changed

noun
  1. male, man
  2. conception
  3. population
  4. (obsolete) stallion

adj
  1. masculine, male
  2. fertile; pretaining to male sexuality, vitality, and potency

  1. (archaic, literary) rose
  2. flower
  3. the core of a watermelon (which is the sweetest part)
  4. clay
  5. silt
  6. mud
  7. lair
  8. (sports) goal

noun
  1. (cytology) white blood cell, leucocyte or leukocyte

noun
  1. golpar, Persian hogweed (Heracleum persicum) (the seeds, leaves and stalks are used in Persian cooking)

noun
  1. (archaic) a garment made out of wool
  2. a rug or carpet made out of coarse material, kilim

adj
  1. missing good opportunities to score a goal

noun
  1. a player who misses good opportunities to score a goal too often

noun

noun
  1. (Astara) velvet maple, Persian maple (Acer velutinum)
  2. a malodorous kind of herb, from which Baḵtīārīs make the dye گندل (gandal)
  3. rotten egg

verb
  1. to rot, decay, go bad, spoil
  2. to stagnate (of water, air, etc)

noun

  2. (obsolete) island

adj

name

  3. (obsolete) Jerusalem

noun

  2. (Iranian mythology) Goudarz

noun
  1. A homeless person who has to sleep in a grave for shelter.

noun
  1. The act of sheltering in a grave to sleep due to homelessness.

verb
  1. (Dari, more informal) to talk; to speak

noun
  1. plaster, gypsum, chalk, stucco
  2. (orthopaedics) plaster cast, orthopaedic cast

adj
  1. (archaic, obsolete) eloquent and articulate, grandiloquent
  2. (archaic) unhurried and leisurely, gentle

noun
  1. long hair (of a woman)
  2. ringlet of hair, a forelock, a sidelock, curl
  3. plait, braid

column2:
suffix
  1. -ful (especially for nouns of emotion, deriving an adjective referring to being full of that emotion)

character
  1. The thirty-second and final letter of the Perso-Arabic alphabet. It is preceded by ه. Its name is یه (ye) or یا (yâ).

particle
  1. the grammatical particle ezafe; see Appendix:Persian ezâfe

name
  1. Joseph (eleventh and favourite son of Jacob)
  2. Joseph (husband of the Virgin Mary)
  3. Joseph (12th sura (chapter) of the Quran)
  4. Joseph (Joseph of Arimathea; man who donated his own prepared tomb for the burial of Jesus.)

noun

  2. (rare) aeon; epoch; period; age; era; (usually in the plural)

name
  1. (computing) Unicode, a series of character encoding standards intended to support the characters used by a large number of the world’s languages.
  2. (computing) The Unicode standards together with standards for representing character strings as byte strings.
